main event: An unidentified aerial vehicle was sighted in Huntington, W. Va. on May 15, 1966.
interesting points: The object was observed at approximately 8:47 PM EST and was about 100 ft. in diameter,The object hovered over an open field and was brightly lit and metallic in nature,The witness claimed to observe the object for approximately 10 minutes before it accelerated and disappeared,The witness stated the light intensity suggested it was not a conventional aircraft or satellite,This sighting was part of the Project Blue Book documentation process.
sighted object: a bright metallic object approximately 100 ft. in diameter
witness description: The witness described the object as brightly lit and metallic, having never seen anything like it before.
